description: The OR_LOG_IB_BODY table contains OR management system log In Basket messages.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the In Basket message for the log.

columns.name: IB_HIST_BODY
columns.description: The body of the In Basket messages for the log.
